data.title: Blood Brothers (I guappi)
data.text:
I guappi

Movie Poster

Country Italy Directed by Pasquale Squitieri Release Date 1974 Language Italian Studio Documento Film

Main Cast Character Actor Nicola Bellizzi Franco Nero Lucia Esposito Claudia Cardinale Don Gaetano Fungillo Fabio Testi Commissaire Aiossa Raymond Pellegrin Pasquale Scalzo Antonio Orlando

Blood Brothers (Original title: I guappi) is a 1974 Italian historical drama film set in the late 19th century in Naples beleaguered criminal organization Camorra. Starring Franco Nero, Claudia Cardinale and Fabio Testi.

The following weapons were used in the film Blood Brothers (I guappi):

Rast-Gasser M1898

Don Gaetano Fungillo (Fabio Testi) used a Rast-Gasser M1898 revolver.

Carcano M91/38 Cavalry Carbine
